description: The fix to https://bugs.launchpad.net/devstack/+bug/1203680 is useless unless people know to set the new variable when doing a DevStack install.  The DevStack documentation should be updated to mention this, as should the various places that describe how to do unit testing.
title: Need documentation of fix to bug 1203680

comments.content: The fix to https://bugs.launchpad.net/devstack/+bug/1203680 is useless unless people know to set the new variable when doing a DevStack install.  The DevStack documentation should be updated to mention this, as should the various places that describe how to do unit testing.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mike-spreitzer

comments.content: In my experience, this fix will cover https://bugs.launchpad.net/devstack/+bug/1203723
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mike-spreitzer

comments.content: I don't see how this is a Nova bug?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content: I don't see how this is Glance bug either.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jokke
